EditText.android:text:
* Calorie Counter: user has the ability enable this calorie counter from a feature selection menu. Feature is designed to calculate calorie burn over a designated time interval.

* Distance Feature: user has the ability enable a distance tracker from a feature selection menu. Feature is designed to calculate and store the distance traveled in miles over a designated time interval.

* Step Counter: user has the ability enable this step counter from a feature selection menu. Feature is designed to track the amount of steps taken over a designated time period.

* Timer: user has the ability enable the timer from a feature selection menu. Feature is designed to track duration of each specific fitness session.

* Average Speed: user has the ability to select the average speed calculator from a feature selection menu. Feature is designed to calculate the average speed a user has moved after the fitness session in complete. Calculations determined are in miles per hour.

**Feature Selection Menu lists every available feature and can be access by tapping the appropriate buttons for use of each service.
